code: import{useLocation,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import logo from'../icons/logo.svg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Header(){const location=useLocation();const navigate=useNavigate();const isAuthPage=location.pathname==='/login'||location.pathname==='/signup';const[dark,setDark]=useState(()=>{const stored=localStorage.getItem('theme');return stored?stored==='dark':true;});useEffect(()=>{const forceDark=isAuthPage||dark;if(forceDark){document.documentElement.classList.add('dark');}else{document.documentElement.classList.remove('dark');}if(!isAuthPage){localStorage.setItem('theme',dark?'dark':'light');}},[dark,isAuthPage]);const handleLogoClick=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('messages');sessionStorage.removeItem('visited');navigate('/chat');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"bg-white dark:bg-zinc-900 text-black dark:text-white p-4 shadow-md fixed top-0 w-full z-40 transition-colors duration-300",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex items-center gap-3 ml-9",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:handleLogoClick,className:"flex items-center gap-2 hover:opacity-80 transition-opacity",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"AS13.ai Logo",className:"h-8 w-auto"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-xl font-bold text-blue-500",children:"AS13.ai"})]})})});}
